bundles.name: SynthMaster Everything Bundle
bundles.tagline: Great choice for ultimate music production
bundles.description: Comes with SynthMaster One, SynthMaster 2, SynthMaster 3 and all current / future presets banks released by KV331 Audio.

bundles.name: SynthMaster Producer Bundle
bundles.tagline: 3 GREAT PLUGINS WITH 10 EXPANSION PACKS INCLUDED
bundles.description: Comes with SynthMaster One, SynthMaster 2, SynthMaster 3 and 10 preset expansion banks of your choice.

expansionPacks.synthMaster2: There are 38 preset expansion banks for SynthMaster 2.
expansionPacks.synthMasterOne: There are 14 expansion banks for SynthMaster One.
